title: Secure File Storage with Filecoin

hero.headline: Decentralized Storage Made Simple
hero.subheadline: Store your files securely on the Filecoin network with end-to-end encryption

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

features.title: Decentralized Storage
features.description: Leverage the power of Filecoin's distributed network for reliable, censorship-resistant storage.

features.title: Easy Integration
features.description: Simple APIs and SDKs make it easy to integrate secure storage into your applications.

features.title: Cost Effective
features.description: Pay only for what you use with competitive pricing on the Filecoin network.

metaDescription: Secure, decentralized file storage powered by Filecoin. Store your data with end-to-end encryption and benefit from the reliability of distributed storage.
